text: Man About Dog is a 2004 Irish British comedy movie directed by Paddy Breathnach and starring Allen Leech, Tom Murphy, Ciaran Nolan, Se√°n McGinley, Pat Shortt, Fionnula Flanagan. ==Other websites== * Category:2004 comedy movies Category:Irish comedy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Paddy Breathnach
